name: buttons
meaning: various buttons e.g. power and volume control

name: fit_head
meaning: how the headeset fit on one's head and ear, such as with glasses

name: noise_cancellation
meaning: whether the people you are talking to can hear background noise, especially in cars, whether has noise cancellation feature

name: cheap
meaning: cheaply priced headsets (positive: good quality for the price; negative: breaks easy don't buy)

name: phone_connection
meaning: connection between headset and phone, signal range, reconnection etc

name: fit_ear
meaning: fit on into/ear, due to e.g. earbud depth, cover, ear hook shape, ear wires

name: great_overall
meaning: highly satisfied overall, specially good quality for the price

name: sound_quality
meaning: sound quality, sometimes with detailed evaluation, bass

name: charging
meaning: everything related to charging the headset: cables, charging speed, through car-charger, on-the-go charger

name: audio_performance
meaning: experience (not just soundwise) listening to music, audiobooks, video

name: voice_command
meaning: Quality of voice command functionality/app for making calls and answering phones

name: transaction_experience
meaning: Customer service experience related to shipping, return, replacement

name: active_lifestyle
meaning: Usability in a active/sports setting, such as during running and gym workout

name: battery
meaning: Quality of battery e.g. talk time on full charge, battery indicator, deteriation over time
